snippet.title: Frostpunk 2 | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the Teaser Trailer for #Frostpunk 2!

❄️Add #Frostpunk 2 to your wishlist: http://re.11bits.com/t90

#Frostpunk #TheCityMustNotFall #SnowBloodOil

The city has undergone significant changes since the events of the first Frostpunk. As it’s grown in both size and population so has it given rise to diverse and conflicting aspirations among its citizens. However, #Frostpunk 2 remains rooted in its focus on an emergent narrative set in a harsh, post-apocalyptic atmosphere. Stay tuned! The gameplay trailer is just around the corner!

-«  Follow Frostpunk 2 »-
Official website: https://frostpunk2.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/frostpunkgame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/frostpunkgame
